mapper.sql: id, client_id, smstype, operatorstype, submit_total, reportsuccess, send_success_ratio, complaint_number, complaint_ratio, complaint_coefficient, complaint_difference, salefee, belong_sale, date, update_time
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_sms_client_operation_statistics
submit_total = #{submitTotal},
reportsuccess = #{reportsuccess},
send_success_ratio = #{sendSuccessRatio},
complaint_number = #{complaintNumber},
complaint_ratio = #{complaintRatio},
complaint_coefficient = #{complaintCoefficient},
complaint_difference = #{complaintDifference},
salefee = #{salefee},
belong_sale = #{belongSale},
update_time = #{updateTime}
WHERE client_id = #{clientId} and smstype = #{smstype} and operatorstype = #{operatorstype} and date = #{date}

INSERT INTO t_sms_client_operation_statistics ( id, client_id, smstype, operatorstype, submit_total, reportsuccess, send_success_ratio, complaint_number, complaint_ratio, complaint_coefficient, complaint_difference, salefee, belong_sale, date, update_time )VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.clientId}, #{item.smstype}, #{item.operatorstype}, #{item.submitTotal}, #{item.reportsuccess}, #{item.sendSuccessRatio}, #{item.complaintNumber}, #{item.complaintRatio}, #{item.complaintCoefficient}, #{item.complaintDifference}, #{item.salefee}, #{item.belongSale}, #{item.date}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sms_client_operation_statistics SET client_id=#{clientId}, smstype=#{smstype}, operatorstype=#{operatorstype}, submit_total=#{submitTotal}, reportsuccess=#{reportsuccess}, send_success_ratio=#{sendSuccessRatio}, complaint_number=#{complaintNumber}, complaint_ratio=#{complaintRatio}, complaint_coefficient=#{complaintCoefficient}, complaint_difference=#{complaintDifference}, salefee=#{salefee}, belong_sale=#{belongSale}, date=#{date}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE t_sms_client_operation_statistics
client_id = #{clientId},
smstype = #{smstype},
operatorstype = #{operatorstype},
submit_total = #{submitTotal},
reportsuccess = #{reportsuccess},
send_success_ratio = #{sendSuccessRatio},
complaint_number = #{complaintNumber},
complaint_ratio = #{complaintRatio},
complaint_coefficient = #{complaintCoefficient},
complaint_difference = #{complaintDifference},
salefee = #{salefee},
belong_sale = #{belongSale},
date = #{date},
update_time = #{updateTime}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select salefee from t_sms_access_${identify}_${date} where clientid=#{clientid} limit 0,1
